snippet: The United States canceled its presidential delegation to the Paralympic Games in Sochi, Russia, citing Russia’s intervention in Ukraine.
abstract: United States cancels its presidential delegation to the Paralympic Games in Sochi, Russia, citing Russia’s intervention in Ukraine; decision will not affect American athletes scheduled to compete.
lead_paragraph: The United States canceled its presidential delegation to the Paralympic Games in Sochi, Russia, citing Russia’s intervention in Ukraine.

headline.main: U.S. Cancels Paralympics Delegation, but Athletes Will Compete
headline.print_headline: U.S. Will Not Send Delegation to Sochi
